# MTLTriangleFillMode.lines

**Case**

Rasterize triangle and triangle strip primitives as lines.

## Declaration

```swift
case lines
```

## Fill modes

- **MTLTriangleFillMode.fill**: Rasterize triangle and triangle strip primitives as filled triangles.
